as.title: Amendment Ordered to be Printed Senate
as.definition: An alternate name for this version is Senate Amendment Ordered to be Printed. This version contains an amendment that has been ordered to be printed.

ash.title: Additional Sponsors House
ash.definition: An alternate name for this version is House Sponsors or Cosponsors Added or Withdrawn. This version is used to add or delete cosponsor names. When used, it most often shows numerous cosponsors being added.
